categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Jedi Jewels was the name given to a pair of young Jedi Knights alive during the final years of the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Jedi Jewels led a segment of the Grand Army of the Republic, consisting of a small band of clone troopers, into several battles. The Jedi gained a mysterious reputation.

Peter Lee created the Jedi Jewels for "Revenge of Enlisted Elite," a Star Wars Miniatures scenario published on the Wizards of the Coast website in July 2005. In the scenario, the Jedi Jewels were one of several components that could be included in a Light Side squad of miniatures.
